data.event: Prior to the Great Flood of 1993, Grafton had enjoyed a stable population of nearly 1,000 residents.
Founded in 1832 by James Mason, Grafton is the oldest city in Jersey County.

event.title: Described as having "a post office, one store, one tavern, and a number of families" in 1834

data.event: Described as having "a post office, one store, one tavern, and a number of families" in 1834, the area was being settled as early as 1812 when a blockhouse was built at the confluence for protection.

event.title: was being settled as early as 1812
